name: Access Northeast
tag_list: colo, datacenter, managed-services, cloud, vmware, fortinet, cisco, mssp
overview:
Access Northeast specializes in Colocation, Managed Services, Virtualization, Wide-Area Networking (WAN) and Disaster Recovery Solutions.

Founded in 1999, Access Northeast is a Regional Data Center, Cloud, Managed Services & WAN Provider with more than 900 Mid-Market, Emerging and Fortune 1000 Customers.

milestones.description: Access Northeast Acquires the Hosting Division of RezZiliant
milestones.source_text:
June 23, 2010 01:36 PM  E-mail| |Comments (0)|  Text size â€“  +

Globe Staff

Access Northeast, a Marlborough-based provider of data center and managed services, said it has acquired the hosting division of RezZiliant Inc., a transaction that gives Access Northeast a presence in RezZiliant's home state of Connecticut.

Financial details of the transaction are not being disclosed.

With the acquisition of RezZiliant hosting and its two data centers in Waterbury and Hartford, Access Northeast said it now leases and operates four facilities throughout New England that total more than 40,000 square feet of space. With the acquisition, Access Northeast said it will now have an employee head count of 32.

"The additional Connecticut Data Centers will assist Access Northeast with the expansion of their Parthenon Cloud footprint for customer replication and disaster recovery services," the company said in a press release.

In a statement included in the release, RezZiliant's president and chief executive Mark Golino said that selling RezZiliant's hosting division will enable the RezZiliant to concentrate on its "rapidly growing health-care software offering for hospitals and medical providers."

Golino has "signed a long-term contract to remain as both a consultant and a customer of Access Northeast," Access Northeast's press release said.
milestones.source_description: Access Northeast buys RezZiliant hosting unit
